mapper.insert: insert into TB_Member( MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ADDRESS ) values( #{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memPhone}, #{memAddress} )
mapper.select: select MEM_ID AS memId, MEM_PW AS memPw, MEM_PHONE AS memPhone, MEM_NAME AS memName, MEM_ADDRESS as memAddress from TB_Member where MEM_ID = #{memId} and MEM_PW = #{memPw}
